column2: 主卡： 4G TDD LTE: Band 34/38/39/40/41 (B41 only for China Mainland) 4G FDD LTE: Band 1/3/7/8/28 3G UMTS(WCDMA)/ HSPA+/ DC-HSDPA: Band 1/2/5/8 3G TD-SCDMA : B34/39 CDMA EV-DO Rev.
